name: japan-statistics-analyzer
title: Japan Government Statistics Analyzer
description: Your comprehensive gateway to Japan's official government statistics. Extract, normalize, and analyze a vast range of data from the e-Stat API for market research, economic analysis, and academic studies.

ESTAT_APP_ID.name: e-Stat API Application ID
ESTAT_APP_ID.description: Your free Application ID for accessing Japan's e-Stat API. Register at https://www.e-stat.go.jp/api/ to get one.
